cast.name: 罗宾·德·齐泽斯 Robin de Jesus
欧嘉·梅雷迪斯 Olga Merediz

this_title: In the Heights: Chasing Broadway Dreams
trans_title: 高地人生 - 百老汇之梦
introduction: The personal stories of composer/lyricist Lin-Manuel Miranda and the cast of the 2008 Tony Award winner In The Heights. In addition to including highlights from some of the show's dynamic performance numbers, this television special takes us into the lives of the cast members to illuminate how this culturally diverse company was able to bring their dreams of performing on the New York stage to fruition.
chinese_title: 高地人生 - 百老汇之梦
foreign_title: In the Heights: Chasing Broadway Dreams
